Original title: Oculus
Year: 2013
105 min.

Synopsis
Some time ago a murder two children orphaned. Authorities blamed the brother, but the sister grew up believing that the real culprit was an ancient cursed mirror. Now fully restored and completed twenty years, the brother is ready to start again, but the sister is determined to prove it was the mirror which shattered his family.
